Dear Mr. Pool:
I am indeed sorry that your letter /or May 16 relative
to convention sites for HASH was misplaced.
The 1951 convention will be held at Biloxi, Mississippi
and the'1952 in Minnesota* It is a'rule that our conventions
are held in or near* one of the member institutions.
